__e: I hear old man Burns is just living in a fantasy world now.
Usually when it gets this quiet Mr. Burns is standing behind me.
(sighs) Dad, Mr. Burns is here for you again.
Sir, we've never met before but my name is Mr. Burns and I want your daughter to help make me rich again.
You need to send Michael Burns and his goomah a "thank you" note for dinner last Friday evening.
Foster, why don't you get Dr. Burns on the phone and have him come in here.
